frontmatter.title: Layer5 Debuts Enterprise Edition of Meshery for Configuring Kubernetes
frontmatter.subtitle: Enterprise-grade distribution of Meshery enables IT teams to visualize, design, and manage Kubernetes and cloud native environments
frontmatter.author: Cloud Native Now
frontmatter.description: Announced at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2025, Kanvas extends the Meshery framework with visual tools, collaborative workspaces, and role-based access control for managing Kubernetes environments
